chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: YAZ++ is a C++ layer for YAZ and implements the ANSI Z39.50 protocol for information retrieval (client and server side).
The YAZ++ packages also features a ZOOM interface for C++ ( ZOOM C++).
Later versions (0.7+) of YAZ++ also supports SRU.
